verses.verse: <S%G50>Know<s%> you not, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> (for I <S%G2980>speak<s%> to them that <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%>) how that the <S%G3551>law<s%> has <S%G2961>dominion<s%> over a <S%G444>man<s%> as <S%G5550>long<s%> as he <S%G2198>lives?<s%>

For the <S%G1135>woman<s%> which <S%G5220>has<s%> an <S%G5220>husband<s%> is <S%G1210>bound<s%> by the <S%G3551>law<s%> to her <S%G435>husband<s%> so long as he <S%G2198>lives;<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> be <S%G599>dead,<s%> she is <S%G2673>loosed<s%> from the <S%G3551>law<s%> of her <S%G435>husband.<s%>

<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G1437>if,<s%> while her <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2198>lives,<s%> she be <S%G1096>married<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> she shall be <S%G5537>called<s%> an <S%G3428>adulteress:<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> her <S%G435>husband<s%> be <S%G599>dead,<s%> she is <S%G1658>free<s%> from that <S%G3551>law;<s%> so that she is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3428>adulteress,<s%> though she be <S%G1096>married<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man.<s%>

<S%G5620>Why,<s%> my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G2289>become<s%> <S%G2289>dead<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%> by the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> that you should be <S%G1096>married<s%> to <S%G2087>another,<s%> even to him who is <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> that we should <S%G2592>bring<s%> forth <S%G2592>fruit<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G3753>when<s%> we were in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> the <S%G3804>motions<s%> of <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were by the <S%G3551>law,<s%> did <S%G1754>work<s%> in our <S%G3196>members<s%> to <S%G2592>bring<s%> forth <S%G2592>fruit<s%> to <S%G2288>death.<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> we are <S%G2673>delivered<s%> from the <S%G3551>law,<s%> that being <S%G599>dead<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> we were <S%G2722>held;<s%> that we should <S%G1398>serve<s%> in <S%G2538>newness<s%> of <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and not in the <S%G3821>oldness<s%> of the <S%G1121>letter.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> Is the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G266>sin?<s%> <S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid.<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G235>No,<s%> I had not <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> but by the <S%G3551>law:<s%> for I had not <S%G1492>known<s%> <S%G1939>lust,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> had <S%G3004>said,<s%> You shall not <S%G1937>covet.<s%>

But <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> by the <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G2716>worked<s%> in me <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G1939>concupiscence.<s%> For <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> was <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

For I was <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G4218>once:<s%> but when the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G326>revived,<s%> and I <S%G599>died.<s%>
And the <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was ordained to <S%G2222>life,<s%> I <S%G2147>found<s%> to be to <S%G2288>death.<s%>
For <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> by the <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G1818>deceived<s%> me, and by it <S%G615>slew<s%> me.
<S%G5620>Why<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G40>holy,<s%> and the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> and <S%G1342>just,<s%> and <S%G18>good.<s%>

Was <S%G3767>then<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> to me? <S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid.<s%> <S%G1096><s%> But <S%G266>sin,<s%> that it might <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2716>working<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> in me by that which is <S%G18>good;<s%> that <S%G266>sin<s%> by the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> might <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2596>exceeding<s%> <S%G5236><s%> <S%G268>sinful.<s%>
For we <S%G1492>know<s%> that the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G4152>spiritual:<s%> but I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4559>carnal,<s%> <S%G4097>sold<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

For that <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2716>do<s%> I <S%G1097>allow<s%> not: for <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2309>would,<s%> that <S%G4238>do<s%> I not; but <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3404>hate,<s%> that <S%G4160>do<s%> I.
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1161>then<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> not, I <S%G4852>consent<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%> that it is <S%G2570>good.<s%>
<S%G3570>Now<s%> <S%G1161>then<s%> it is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> I that <S%G2716>do<s%> it, but <S%G266>sin<s%> that <S%G3611>dwells<s%> in me.

For I <S%G1492>know<s%> that in me (that is, in my <S%G4561>flesh,<s%>) <S%G3611>dwells<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> thing: for to <S%G2309>will<s%> is <S%G3873>present<s%> with me; but how to <S%G2716>perform<s%> that which is <S%G2570>good<s%> I <S%G2147>find<s%> not.
For the <S%G18>good<s%> that I <S%G2309>would<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> not: but the <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> not, that I <S%G4238>do.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> that I <S%G2309>would<s%> not, it is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> I that <S%G2716>do<s%> it, but <S%G266>sin<s%> that <S%G3611>dwells<s%> in me.
I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> a <S%G3551>law,<s%> that, when I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> is <S%G3873>present<s%> with me.
For I <S%G4913>delight<s%> in the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G2080>inward<s%> <S%G444>man:<s%>

But I <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> in my <S%G3196>members,<s%> <S%G497>warring<s%> <S%G497>against<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of my <S%G3563>mind,<s%> and <S%G163>bringing<s%> me into <S%G163>captivity<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in my <S%G3196>members.<s%>
O <S%G5005>wretched<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> that I am! <S%G5101>who<s%> shall <S%G4506>deliver<s%> me from the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2288>death?<s%>

I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> with the <S%G3563>mind<s%> I myself <S%G1398>serve<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> but with the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin.<s%>
